import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get location by ID"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v2.0/locations/{LocationId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves a single location by its unique identifier. Returns the complete location record including address, type, status, custom field values, and room count.

**Prerequisites**
1. **LocationId** - Obtain via [GET /api/v2.0/locations](/docs/api/locations/get-my-locations-v-2) and extract `Items[].LocationId`, or from ticket/asset/user records.

**Workflow Example**
1. List accessible locations: [GET /api/v2.0/locations](/docs/api/locations/get-my-locations-v-2) â†’ identify target location.
2. Call this endpoint: [GET /api/v2.0/locations/\{LocationId\}](/docs/api/locations/get-location-by-id-v-2) with the target `LocationId`.
3. Use returned data to display location details including address, type, and status.

**Related Endpoints:**
- [GET /api/v2.0/locations/\{LocationId\}/address](/docs/api/locations/get-location-address-v-2) - Get only the address
- [PUT /api/v2.0/locations/\{LocationId\}](/docs/api/locations/update-location-v-2) - Update the location

**Authentication:** Requires valid bearer token.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"LocationId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Unique identifier of the location to retrieve","example":"aa632d8d-486f-ed11-ade6-cc60c8b5ca80"},{"name":"Authorization","in":"header","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Bearer token for authentication","example":"Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..."},{"name":"SiteId","in":"header","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Site context for the request","example":"bb6cece8-e4f4-e511-a789-005056bb000e"},{"name":"ProductId","in":"header","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Product context for the request","example":"88df910c-91aa-e711-80c2-0004ffa00010"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
